ViewClassLoader

protected ViewClassLoader(View view)
Constructor. Protected so only classes within package can call.

Method Detail

readBytes

private byte[] readBytes(java.lang.String className)
Read the raw bytes for the given class name. Note that use of WebObject synchronizes multiple concurrent attempts to fetch the same data; it will only be fetched once, and this copy returned to all callers.
Parameters:
className - the name of the class to load (e.g., java.util.Vector).
Returns:
the bytes defining the class, or null.

public java.lang.Class loadClass(java.net.URL codeBase,
                       java.lang.String className) throws java.lang.Exception

loadClass

public java.lang.Class loadClass(java.lang.String className)
Load a class given its name. Fully resolve the class before returning.
Parameters:
className - the name of the class to load (e.g., java.util.Vector).
Returns:
the class, or null.
Overrides:
loadClass in class java.lang.ClassLoader

loadClass

public java.lang.Class loadClass(java.lang.String className,
                       boolean resolve)
Load a class given its name. Optionally resolve the class before returning.
Parameters:
className - the name of the class to load (e.g., java.util.Vector).
Returns:
the class, or null.
Overrides:
loadClass in class java.lang.ClassLoader

defineClass

protected java.lang.Class defineClass(java.lang.String className,
                            byte[] data)
Define the class.
Parameters:
className - the name of the class.
data - the bytes comprising the class definition.
Returns:
the new class definition (or the old one if race has already defined one); returns null if fail to define the class.
